caption:
“Holiness wears sneakers.”

Reflection:
Sanctity walks among us — in errands, in laughter, in long commutes and late nights.

Commentary:
This quote reminds us that holiness isn’t distant. The sacred is stitched into daily living — we can walk faithfully in ordinary shoes.
